name: Abritrator Compact Gantry
desc:
Compact Launch Bays that ease servicing Smaller Space Vehicles such as Arbitrators. Optimized Tooling and space Usage Allow the deck crew to manage %s for each Installed Arbitrator wing.

Those Specialized facilities do not offer any tangible benefit, nor drawback, when operating regular fighters and wanzers wings.
short: Adds one More Fighter to a Wing of Arbitrators.

name: Proto Gyro Phase Core
desc:
the Gyro Core has been Replaced with a self containing Stable Phase core,during shut down, care must be take to not Implode the ship.
Boost the Ship Speed by %s.

name: Improved Thrusters
desc: Increases the ship's maneuverability by %s. Incompatible with %s.

name: Streamlined Capacitors
short: lowers Flux gen by energy weapons.

name: Micro Grazer Core
desc: A Prototype Micro Phase Grazer Core is Installed on this Ship, Behaves like a Phase Grazer Core.
short: Allows the Ship to use a Phase Grazer Core.

name: Nitro Injection
desc: Increase 0-flux boost speed by %s. - incompatible with %s, %s.

name: Wing Defense Doctrine
desc: a Defensive Wing doctrine Reducing the Range of the wing engagement by %s and helps reduce crew losses by %s.
short: Set the Fighter range to 0 and reduces crew losses by 25%.

name: Regulated Shields
desc: Reduces the amount of soft flux raised shields generate per second by %s and Converts %s of the hard flux damage taken by shields to soft flux. - incompatible with %s.
short: Reduces the Flux gen on Shields and Converts hard flux to soft flux.

name: Overloaded Subsystems
desc: Increases the rate of in-combat CR decay after peak performance time runs out by %s and Decreases peak performance time by %s.
short: Halves both CR Decay rate and Peak Performance time by 50%.

name: Brown Note Modification
desc:
The Ship System is not Designed as a Phase Cloak thus does not use Coils, their speed never goes lower than %s during use.

This Ship system is not a phase cloak thus canâ€™t use %s.
short: Reduces impact of hard flux level on top speed while using the Phase Wave.

name: Micro Grazer Core
desc: A Prototype Micro Phase Grazer Core is Installed on this Ship, Behaves like a Phase Grazer Core.
short: Allows the Ship to use a Phase Grazer Core.
